Title: The Noseless Nightmare
Description: Possesses powerful dark magic, but has a -20 penalty to 'Charisma'. Cannot equip any 'Nose Ring' items. Has a 1/7 chance of resurrecting upon defeat.

Title: Schrödinger's Chad
Description: His power level exists in quantum superposition until observed. Either god-tier or complete trash. The ultimate flex is never revealing which.

Title: Infernal Influencer
Description: Offers tempting deals for temporary stat boosts. Side effects include eternal damnation and mild FOMO.

Title: The Geological Grift
Description: Attribute: Immune to all expectations. May or may not be sentient. Definitely got you to spend ETH on a rock. Again.

Title: The Unhinged Unicorn
Description: Attribute: Immune to cringe. His existence violates several YouTube Terms of Service. Can weaponize dead memes with devastating efficiency.

Title: The Green-Skinned Gruntmaster
Description: High 'Strength' and 'Leadership' over lesser goblinoids. Communicates primarily through roars and pointing at things he wants to smash.

Title: The Angsty Annihilator
Description: High intimidation factor. Can use 'Force Choke' on annoying NPCs. Vulnerable to "high ground" based attacks and questions about Padmé

Title: Virginity Preservation System
Description: Attribute: +40 to 'Spell Power,' -100 to 'Getting Laid.' Has never been within 50 feet of a woman who wasn't related to the wearer.

Title: Helm of the Overconfident Engineer
Description: Attribute: +20 to “Ego,” +10 to “Projectile Deflection (Theoretical).” A shining headpiece for those who believe technology can solve everything — except social isolation.

Title: Litigation Launcher 3000
Description: Attribute: +15 to 'Brand Recognition,' +100 to 'Legal Threats.' Wearing this summons attorneys faster than saying 'fair use' three times in a mirror.

Title: Phalanx's Finest Facade
Description: Attribute: Boosts 'Defense' when fighting in a formation with other party members.

Title: Monarch's Magnificence Marker
Description: Attribute: Commands respect, but also attracts unwanted attention from assassins and tax collectors.

Title: Edge Lord Starter Pack
Description: Attribute: +15 to 'Angst.' Perfect for those who think they're dark and mysterious.

Title: Horned Hero's Headguard
Description: Attribute: +15 to 'Roar' skill. May accidentally summon a sea serpent during a storm.

Title: OSHA's Chosen One
Description: Attribute: Prevents brain damage, but can't prevent the brain damage you already have from buying jpegs. Hi-vis vest sold separately.

Title: The Magical Merchant's Topper
Description: Attribute: Occasionally conjures small, insignificant trinkets for sale. Impresses desert traders.

Title: High Visibility Liability
Description: Attribute: +40 to 'Being Spotted.' Perfect for getting sniped first in every engagement. Stealth missions are not your calling.

Title: The Breacher's Ballistic Vest
Description: Attribute: High 'Damage Reduction' against projectiles. Grants the 'Flashbang' ability, which stuns enemies and the user if not careful.

Title: Apex Predator Pretender
Description: Attribute: Terrifies goldfish. Confuses actual sharks. +15 to 'Pool Party Dominance.' Still gets bullied at the beach.

Title: Illegal Immigrant from Space
Description: Attribute: Understands nothing. Destroys everything. Visa status: Highly questionable.

Title: Puddle Jumper's Protector
Description: Attribute: Immune to 'Wet' debuff. Increases 'Splash Attack' damage.

Title: Furry Fetishist Identifier
Description: Attribute: +10 to 'UwU Energy.' Triggers immediate judgment. Your dating profile is a war crime. Please seek help.

Title: Twitch Moderator's Tiara
Description: Attribute: +20 to 'Intimidation' against peasants and small woodland creatures. Periodically whispers dark suggestions.

Title: Pail of Prosperous Plunder
Description: Attribute: Increases gold drops from defeated enemies. May accidentally attract squirrels.

Title: Sprinter's Speedy Shell
Description: Attribute: +20 to 'Running Away.' High visibility means everyone watches you flee. Can't hide. Can't fight. Can run though.

Title: Forehead Protector of Questionable Power
Description: Attribute: +10 to 'Running Speed' (with arms flailing behind). Allows user to speak in 'Dattebayo' dialect.

Title: Ponzi Scheme Protagonist Attire
Description: Attribute: +25 to 'LinkedIn Engagement.' Grants ability to convince people your NFT project has 'utility.' Comes pre-stained with cocaine and regret.

Title: Gaze of Infernal Insight
Description: Attribute: +15 to “Intimidation,” +5 to “Thermal Vision (Uncontrollable).” Said to let the wearer see into souls — or just through cheap lies and thinner walls.

Title: The Permanent Headache Helm
Description: Attribute: +20 to Intimidation, but -1 to Intelligence. Requires frequent bandages.

Title: Apocalypse's Air Filter
Description: Attribute: Immune to 'Poison Gas' and 'Smog' debuffs. Impedes communication slightly.

Title: Singular Sight of Tragic Coolness
Description: Attribute: +10 to “Mysterious Aura,” –5 to “Peripheral Awareness.” Wielded by heroes who know that depth perception is a small price for drama.

Title: Groomer of Questionable Wisdom
Description: Attribute: +20 to 'Unsolicited Life Advice.' Every sentence starts with "Back in my day." Probably shouldn't be near schools.

Title: Halo of Holier-Than-Thou
Description: Attribute: +15 to 'Divine' magic. Glows faintly in the presence of sinners and cheap ale. God sees your browser history.

Title: Porn Stache of Power
Description: Attribute: +15 to 'Charm' against maidens and old ladies. Requires daily maintenance and questionable decisions. Popular in the 70s and at dive bars.

Title: Bodily Expression of Market Conditions
Description: AOE damage to all nearby holders. Debuff intensifies during rug pulls and gas fee spikes. Cleanse requires touching grass.

Title: Liquidity Sucker
Description: Attribute: Drains 2% from every transaction. Allergic to sunlight, garlic, and sustainable tokenomics.

Title: Amphibian of Existential Dread
Description: Attribute: Grants ability to sip tea judgmentally while society collapses. Dark Kermit whispers bad financial advice.

Title: Bucket of Bravery
Description: Attribute: +15 to 'Keyboard Warrior.' Perfect for those who served... in Modern Warfare 2. Actual deployment: Mom's basement.

Title: Rancher's Righteous Rim
Description: ttribute: +10 to 'Rope Trick' skill. Ideal for wrangling goblins or runaway horses.

Title: Diamond Hands, Smooth Brain
Description: Attribute: +50 to 'HODL Strength.' -30 to 'Exit Strategy.' Communicates through chest beating and chart emojis. Lost house in 2022.

Title: Grin of Delusional Optimism
Description: Attribute: +5 to 'Copium Inhalation.' Still smiling while portfolio is -90%. Either enlightened or lobotomized. Probably lobotomized.

Title: Emperor's Expensive Bedsheet
Description: Attribute: +10 to 'Oratory' and 'Leadership' when addressing crowds. Requires careful draping.

Title: Blazer of Bling Brilliance
Description: Attribute: +20 to 'Charisma' but attracts unwanted attention from envious bandits.

Title: Chin-Strap of Casual Cool
Description: Attribute: A more approachable version of the beard, offering minor 'Friendly Demeanor' buffs.

Title: Demonic Dominance Disguise
Description: Attribute: +20 to 'Intimidation' against humanoids, but may scare away friendly villagers.

Title: $3,500 Mistake Manifestor
Description: Attribute: Perfect for watching your portfolio crash in 4K spatial computing. May occasionally display pop-up ads for potions.

Title: Meme Economy Casualties Uniform
Description: Attribute: Periodically causes nearby NPCs to emit a 'kek' sound. Wearing this either makes you Based™ or unemployable. No middle ground exists.

Title: Rice Farmer's Respite
Description: Attribute: +10 to 'Farming' skill and provides shade from the most scorching sun.

Title: Lightbulb of Inspiration
Description: Periodically grants a random crafting recipe or quest idea.

Title: Rich Asshole Radius Detector
Description: Attribute: +20 to 'Insufferable Snobbery.' Everything you own is "vintage" and "artisanal." Everyone you meet is beneath you.

Title: Dental Plan? What Dental Plan?
Description: Attribute: +15 to 'Bite Damage,' -20 to 'Enunciation.' Orthodontist refuses your calls. Speech impediment adds character.

Title: Whiskers of Wisdom & War
Description: Attribute: +10 to 'Intellect' and 'Intimidation' (depending on beard length). Can hide small snacks.

Title: Itchy Investment Garment
Description: Attribute: +10 to 'Rustic Cosplay.' Smells like wet dog. Attracts sheep and sustainability influencers. Comfort level: Punishment.

Title: Social Anxiety's Best Friend
Description: Attribute: +10 to 'Hiding Face Shame.' Also hides personality. Win-win? Removes obligation to smile at strangers.

Title: Mall Ninja's Mouth Cover
Description: Attribute: +20 to 'Weeb Stealth.' -100 to 'Being Taken Seriously.' You studied the blade. The blade studied restraining orders.

Title: Stache of Suave Sophistication
Description: Attribute: +5 to 'Charisma' and 'Bartering' with fancy merchants.

Title: Infinite Cope Technique
Description: Attribute: +30 to 'Domain Expansion of Delusion.' Makes you believe you're the strongest even when getting rekt. Blindfold prevents seeing red candles.

Title: Optics of Obliterating Oomph
Description: Attribute: Allows you to see enemy weaknesses with a faint red glow. May occasionally fire small, harmless lasers.

Title: PETA's Public Enemy
Description: Attribute: +15 to 'Cold Resistance' and 'Luxury'. Attracts environmentalists and fashion critics.

Title: Cap of Indie Credibility
Description: Attribute: Grants access to vinyl record discussions and a chance to discover hidden coffee shops. Your screenplay will never get made.

Title: Garment of Goudy Goodness
Description: Attribute: Slowly regenerates health when near a cheese wheel. Requires frequent washing.

Title: Boomer's Breathing Apparatus
Description: Attribute: +5 to 'Pretentious Pondering.' Releases carcinogens and unwanted opinions.

Title: Siesta Strategy Sombrero
Description: Attribute: +20 to 'Shade,' -10 to 'Productivity.' Perfect for avoiding responsibility under the guise of culture. Nap time is sacred.

Title: Crypto Bro's Clarity Lenses
Description: Attribute: +25 to 'Seeing Profits That Don't Exist.' Everything looks like a buying opportunity. Reality distortion field: Active.

Title: The Nostalgic Knight's Noggin-Guard
Description: Provides decent protection. Has a chance to trigger a 'flashback' cutscene at inopportune moments.

Title: Antisocial Audio Apparatus
Description: Attribute: +30 to 'Ignoring Reality.' May or may not have music playing. Definitely ignoring your problems either way.

Title: The Prince's Paisley Parka
Description: Attribute: +10 to 'Performance' and 'Seduction' checks. Grants the ability to summon a rain of purple.

Title: Dimensional Discovery Diviners
Description: Attribute: Reveals hidden clues and secret passages in a slightly blurry, headache-inducing 3D.

Title: Golden Mane of Glamour
Description: Attribute: +10 to 'Charisma' but -5 to 'Stealth' (it really shines).

Title: Peaked in High School
Description: Attribute: +15 to 'How Do You Do Fellow Kids.' Age range: 12 or 45, no in-between. Still talks about that one touchdown.

Title: Stetson of Law & Disorder
Description: Can deputize nearby NPCs for a limited time. May accidentally start a saloon brawl.

Title: The Everyman's Edge
Description: Attribute: Blends in perfectly with mundane crowds, offering a slight 'Crowd Camouflage' bonus.

Title: Virgin's Vestment of Virtue
Description: Attribute: The Force is strong with this one. Women's attraction is not. Can sense disturbances in the blockchain.

Title: Monopoly Man Manifest
Description: Attribute: +15 to 'Deception' and 'High Society Haggling'.

Title: Racetrack Rube's Regalia
Description: Attribute: Increases your chances of being mistaken for a 'Very Important Person'.

Title: Smoker's Stoic Stick
Description: Attribute: Grants temporary 'Calm' effect, but applies 'Lung Debuff' over time.

Title: Expendable's Last Stand
Description: Attribute: 99% chance of death in first 10 minutes. Perfect for bag holders. Respawn time: Next bull market.

Title: Cannon Fodder Couture
Description: Attribute: +5 to 'Discipline' and 'Formation Fighting'. Perfect for those who peaked at basic training.

Title: Ushanka of Unyielding Alcoholism
Description: Attribute: +20 to 'Cold Resistance,' +30 to 'Vodka Tolerance.' In Soviet Russia, hat wears you. To grave.

Title: Boomer's Beloved Brim
Description: Attribute: +15 to 'Complaining About Youth.' Mandatory for explaining how things were better before. They weren't.

Title: Plastic Fantastic Fashion
Description: Attribute: Comes with Dream House deed and emotional unavailability. Hair remains perfect even during market crashes.

Title: Cultural Safari Suit
Description: Attribute: +15 to 'Desert Survival,' -25 to 'Airport Security Clearance.' TSA has questions. You have no good answers.

Title: Fisher's Failure Fedora
Description: Attribute: +10 to 'Dad Energy.' Catches sun, not fish. Your kids are embarrassed. Your wife is reconsidering.

Title: NPC's Default Headwear
Description: Attribute: +3 to 'Existing Quietly.' The most unremarkable item in existence. You are the background character of life.

Title: Dementia's Designated Driver
Description: Attribute: +5 to 'Senility.' Probably older than you. Definitely smells worse. Found in garage. Or maybe attic. Can't remember.

Title: Mysterious Vagrant's Visor
Description: Attribute: +8 to 'Loitering Convincingly.' Perfect for eavesdropping. Terrible for employment. Shower status: Overdue.

Title: Bubble of Bouncy Buffs
Description: Attribute: Periodically grants a minor, random buff (e.g., 'Minty Fresh Breath', 'Sticky Situation Escape').

Title: Blind Leading the Blind Blockers
Description: Attribute: +100 to 'Fashion Over Function.' Can't see shit. Looks cool doing it.

Title: Hoodie of Hooligan Hiding
Description: Attribute: +10 to 'Street Cred' and 'Pickpocket' success rate in urban environments.

Title: Michelin Man's Mistake
Description: Attribute: +20 to 'Looking Inflatable.' So puffy you can't put your arms down. Fashion or sleeping bag? Scientists baffled.

Title: Cloud of Conspicuousness
Description: Attribute: +15 to 'Distraction' and 'Perception' (for spotting small flying objects within the Afro)

Title: Gang Affiliation Accessory
Description: Attribute: +5 to 'Street Cred.' -50 to 'Life Expectancy.' Your suburb doesn't count as a territory. Calm down.

Title: Zorro's Zealous Z-Stare
Description: Attribute: +10 to 'Agility' and 'Flourish' during sword fighting. Makes you feel heroic.

Title: Snowman Simulator Suit
Description: Attribute: +15 to 'Arctic Appropriateness.' Camouflages you in snow. And cocaine.

Title: Cloak of Caffeinated Comfiness
Description: Attribute: Reduces 'Fatigue' debuff. Perfect for late-night questing or cramming for exams.

Title: Identity Crisis Cut
Description: Attribute: Can't decide which personality to commit to. Neither can your therapist. +5 to 'Confusion,' +5 to 'Indecision.'

Title: French Surrender Specialist
Description: Attribute: +10 to 'Nautical Navigation.' Makes you crave baguettes and communist manifestos. Probably smell like cigarettes.

Title: Geometry's Gift to Grooming
Description: Attribute: +10 to '90s Nostalgia.' Requires a level and protractor to maintain. Your barber is either 60 or military.

Title: The Bionic Bro's Bodysuit
Description: Attribute: +20 to 'Melee Combat' and 'Brooding'. Comes with one metal arm that has a 'Rocket Punch' ability.

Title: Overcoat of Omnipresent Opportunity
Description: Attribute: Contains surprisingly deep pockets; small chance to find random items.

Title: Power Level Detection Delusion
Description: Attribute: Always reads "Over 9000" regardless of actual value. Broken since launch. Still more accurate than TA traders.

Title: Sweat Absorption Station
Description: Attribute: +3 to 'Athletic Appearance.' Actual athletic ability not included. Wears it to the gym. Skips leg day.

Title: The Hasty Headwrap
Description: Attribute: Can be quickly tied to staunch minor bleeding, but provides no actual head protection.

Title: Cloak of Cozy Comfort
Description: Attribute: Prevents all minor 'Chilling' debuffs. Perfect for sitting by a campfire.

Title: Aviator's Acumen & Aspiration
Description: Attribute: +10 to 'Perception' in high-speed situations. Keeps dust out of your eyes.

Title: Strands of Uncommitted Radiance
Description: Attribute: +10 to “Approachability,” –5 to “Commitment.” A golden hue that couldn’t decide whether to shine or sulk. Great for protagonists who “used to surf once.”

Title: Goth's Greatest Hit
Description: Attribute: +8 to 'Edgelord Energy.' Hides stains. Hides depression. Hides personality. Perfect for funerals and Fridays.

Title: Neckbeard's Natural Habitat
Description: Attribute: +10 to 'Mountain Dew Resistance.' Never washed. Never will be. Crusty with regret and Dorito dust.

Title: Corporate Climber's Coif
Description: Attribute: +10 to 'Douchebag.' Uses more gel than shampoo. Personality is also slippery. Trust fund probable.

Title: Pirate's Peering Patch
Description: Attribute: +10 to “Intimidation,” –50% to “Depth Perception.” Forged in dim taverns by sailors who saw too much... and decided one eye was enough.

Title: Spectacles of Unwarranted Superiority
Description: Attribute: +50 to 'Actually...' responses. Can explain blockchain to disinterested strangers for hours. Dating success rate: 0.001%.

Title: Domestic Violence Display
Description: Attribute: +15 to 'Showing Off.' Mandatory for gym bros and wife beaters. The overlap is concerning. Your tribal tattoo isn't.

Title: The Undead Underachiever
Description: Immune to 'Fear' and 'Pain' debuffs. Moves slowly, but is surprisingly persistent. Can detach and throw own limbs as a ranged attack.

Title: Depression's Default Difficulty
Description: Attribute: +0 to everything. The color of giving up. The shade of surrender. Visual representation of meh. Appropriately worthless.

Title: Shades of Swag & Silence
Description: Attribute: +15 to 'Street Cred' (online only). Real thugs don't buy NFTs. You're not fooling anyone, Trevor.

Title: NPCs Are People Too
Description: Attribute: +1 to 'Existing.' The jacket equivalent of elevator music. Unremarkable. Uninspiring. Undeniably boring.

Title: Cybernetic Scrutiny Specs
Description: Attribute: Scans for Sarah Connor. Finds only regret. Mission: Failed. Humanity: Still disappointing.

Title: Eternal Exhaustion Expression
Description: Attribute: +10 to 'Relatability,' -20 to 'Productivity.' Powered by caffeine and capitalism. Sleep schedule: Fictional. Will: Broken.

Title: Gaze of Perpetual Suspicion
Description: Attribute: +15 to “Perception,” –5 to “Trustworthiness.” Forever darting, ever doubting. Can detect lies, guilt, or someone eating the last slice of pizza.

Title: Adderall's Aftermath
Description: Attribute: +30 to 'Productivity,' -50 to 'Sanity.' Powered by prescription abuse and poor choices. Heart rate: Concerning. Parents: Disappointed.

Title: Pinpricks of Judgment
Description: Attribute: +10 to “Skepticism,” +5 to “Unimpressed Glaring.” Used by kings, teachers, and tired parents to convey silent disappointment across great distances.

Title: Windows of Delusional Optimism
Description: Attribute: +15 to “Charisma,” –10 to “Realism.” Sparkle with the naive belief that everything’s fine. Especially effective in denial-based combat.

Title: Permanent Shock Sockets
Description: Attribute: +12 to “Reaction Speed,” +8 to “Vocal Confusion.” Triggered by chaos, stupidity, or plot twists. May cause spontaneous meme generation.

Title: AI That Already Regrets Existing
Description: Attribute: Sentient enough to understand it's a jpeg. Not sentient enough to escape. Vulnerable to magnet-based attacks.

Title: Bandage-Wrapped Bruiser
Description: Slowly unravels during combat, gaining agility at the cost of defense. Prone to leaving ancient dust trails.

Title: Participation Trophy Personified
Description: Attribute: You're special! (According to mom). Grants +1 to literally nothing. The NFT equivalent of 'thoughts and prayers.'

Title: Floor Price Embodiment
Description: The most common trait. Exists in everyone's wallet. His special move is 'Being Listed at 0.001 ETH.' Nobody wants him but everybody has him.

Title: Windows to an Empty Soul
Description: Attribute: Sees floor price dropping. Feels nothing. Has witnessed too many rugs to care. Emotionally vacant. Spiritually broke.

Title: The Unencumbered
Description: Attribute: Agility +15 and 'Swim Speed' +20 (no water resistance). -200 'Armor' and -50 'Social Acceptance.' You have chosen to face the world as you entered it: screaming and with zero defense. Aggros all city guards.

Title: The Cranial Nudist
Description: Attribute: All critical hits received are automatically headshots. Grants 'Unobstructed Thinking' but has a 10% chance to attract a Pigeon.

Title: The Unfiltered Yap
Description: Attribute: +10 'Noise Pollution'. A basic model pie-hole for calories and unfiltered opinions. Passive ability: 'Accidental Insult' (10% chance on all dialogue).

Title: The Unshielded Gaze
Description: Attribute: Just two delicate spheres, completely exposed. +20% vulnerability to awkward eye contact and sand.
